snippet: Amid a deepening feud, the satellite distributor said it would not renew its contract with AMC Networks. The channels affected include the flagship cable channel - home of "The Killing" and "Mad Men" - as well as IFC, WE tv and the Sundance Channel.
abstract: Amid a deepening feud, the satellite distributor said it would not renew its contract with AMC Networks. The channels affected include the flagship cable channel - home of "The Killing" and "Mad Men" - as well as IFC, WE tv and the Sundance Channel.

headline.main: Dish Network Says It Will Drop AMC in Summer
